channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Hit List
channel.desc: Time for the stars to shine in another celebrity special! The three teams joining Marvin and Rochelle Humes are presenter Rick Edwards and musician Harry Judd, Morning Live's Dr Xand Van Tulleken and Michelle Ackerley, and Gladiators Steel and Dynamite. Who will hit the right note and get the chance to win ?10,000 for their chosen charity? Get ready to shout out the answers at the telly and play along at home!
